group_1.textLeft: Good morning.

group_1.textRight: Good morning!
...Oh? Is Temari not with you today?
I thought you always took the same train.

group_1.textLeft: We do, but...@I haven't heard from her since this morning.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!@Do you think something happened?

group_1.textLeft: No...@I'm pretty sure I've seen this before.

group_1.textRight: You have?

group_1.textLeft: Yep.
...Ah.@G'morning, Komachi.
I... managed to finish the revisions...@[chara:304001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:304001:lipSynch_1][chara:304001:effect_shake][shake?]somehow...

group_1.textRight: Woah, what's with your face?!@You look practically dead!
...Your Soul Gem's even tainted.
Here, use this Grief Seed.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.@That really helped.

group_1.textRight: ...Phew.
Have you been in here this entire time?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... I hit a bit of a stride, and didn't want to stop@my train of thought.
I finished writing around dawn, but... it seems to@have been more mentally taxing than I expected.
It was really just supposed to be a simple revision.@I've never had this happen before.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I've never seen you like this before either.

group_1.textLeft: Also, though I finished around dawn, I was too@awake to sleep afterward.
So I thought I'd do some reading...

group_1.textRight: ...And passed out right there, huh.
Wait, you tried to sit and READ in a state like that?
I wish one of the security guards had found you...

group_1.textLeft: Do you? There'd probably have been a huge@commotion if they did.

group_1.textRight: ...Look, let's just get to class, okay?@And make sure to phone your parents!

group_1.textLeft: Mm... understood.
...Ah.@So this is what you meant by "a revision".

group_1.textRight: So? Your impressions?

group_1.textLeft: It sure isn't the ending I expected...
Yeah, I like it.@Let's go with this.
...But promise me you won't push yourself like that@again.

group_1.textRight: Understood.@I'm not proud of myself, either...

group_1.textLeft: So, the issue now is the final scene.@What should we do for this part?
Like you said yesterday...
It might be better to keep this a secret from Mihono.

group_1.textRight: ...Quite right.
How about we swap out just the final page for@Mihono and the others' scripts?
The actual script will be a secret for just the two@of us.
Shall I keep it locked in the cabinet, just in case?

group_1.textLeft: Along with the diary transcript, yeah.@Our cover will be blown if anyone reads this...

group_1.textRight: And... there.
I'm surprised you even found a diary from the man@himself, though.
I take it you were continuing your research even@after we started filming?

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, everyone was working so hard, I thought I@should portray him as realistically as possible too.
I wanted to take a glance at every possible reference@that I could find for the role.

group_1.textRight: ...A change of heart, Komachi?
I thought "I'd rather not be a protagonist" was your@catchphrase.
